questions.question: What key idea did Hippocrates introduce?
questions.explain: Hippocrates promoted clinical observation and the Four Humours.

questions.question: What were the Romans best known for?
questions.explain: Romans were skilled at sewers, baths and aqueducts.

questions.question: Which factor slowed medical progress in medieval Europe?
questions.explain: Church control and limited access to texts contributed to stagnation.

questions.question: What did Vesalius study?
questions.explain: Vesalius produced modern anatomical studies through dissections.

questions.question: Who pioneered vaccination?
questions.explain: Edward Jenner developed smallpox vaccination techniques using cowpox.

questions.question: Who developed penicillin into an effective drug?
questions.explain: Florey & Chain scaled up production and clinical use of penicillin.
